credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Glorification of missionary activities
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. The left part of a sarcophagus is shown, standing upon a platform in a cemetery. A woman leans upon it. She points with a mace at a savage woman sitting upon the steps, and she looks at "Church" or "Religion" approaching in a glory. Beside her walks an angel holding the end of the cross and a palm branch. Framing line.
name: Drawing
